testcase.name: VIR-240.01 Verify that the following message is shown to the customer if they entered wrong login data at first and second times
VIR-240.02 Verify that the error message is shown to the customer if they entered wrong login data three and more times
VIR-240.03 Verify that the account is locked automatically after 3 incorrect login attempts
VIR-240.04 Verify that the customer can phone via Skype when they click on the phone number from desktop browser
VIR-240.05 Verify that the customer can phone via phone/skype when they click on the phone number from mobile device
